############
 printfluxes
############

*printfluxes* script shows flux information from available transport
models. It uses core_transport ids
It gives information about Mass of atom, Nuclear charge and Ion charge
along with particles and nergy flux of ions.
`refer data dictionary <https://sharepoint.iter.org/departments/POP/CM/IMDesign/Data%20Model/sphinx/latest.html>`_.

*******************
 Syntax printfluxes
*******************

   .. command-output:: printfluxes -h


Example printfluxes
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

   .. code-block:: bash

        $ printfluxes --uri "imas:mdsplus?user=public;pulse=92436;run=850;database=TEST;version=3"
         Showing details for sdcc-login04.iter.org:imas:mdsplus?user=public;pulse=92436;run=850;database=TEST;version=3 #time:49.00)
         ┌───────────────────────────┬───────┬─────┬───────┬─────────────────────┬──────────────────┐

         ├───────────────────────────┼───────┼─────┼───────┼─────────────────────┼──────────────────┤
